ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Strangely enough I ve never heard someone talking about how great their class gets AFTER level 35.  It seems that every class has major gripes and what REALLY
ygData.messageBody:
Strangely enough I've never heard someone talking about how great their
class gets AFTER level 35. It seems that every class has major gripes and
what REALLY is wrong is level 35 and up? Besides, don't forget Selo. I
just traded for my MM drums and I'm FLYING. I would imagine the twisting
some magic resist songs will never become useless, and I planning on
twisting heal and mana when I hit 32...

On another note, my brother's first encounter with the Predator yielded an
obsidian shard which I thoroughly enjoyed for days... then some darn level
50 shaman gave me an offer for it I couldn't refuse: an obsidian scimitar,
an obsidian hoop, a chipped bone bracelet, a +4 wis +4 dex? veil, and 200
plat. I immediately turned around and traded the obsidian hoop to another
level 50 for azure sleeves and gave the veil, sleeves, and bracelet to my
brother's druid. The scimitar is decent, but I miss my shard! I never saw
any stamina loss when I was duel wielding my dragoon dirk and the shard.
I've been trying to camp the predator now for the last 3 nights and haven't
seen anything but place holder spawns. Anyone have advice on how to get the
predator to spawn?

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 28th song (sliver from 29!)
Prexus

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
> Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 3:04 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Great post on item balancing (Long)
>
>
> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > At times I wish I could hit as hard as my wife's warrior, or do crowd
> > control as well as my buddy's enchanter, or snare as well as my
> brother's
> > druid or friend's ranger, or buff as well as my friend's
> shaman... but who
> > else can do it ALL?
>
> You will certainly do it all later on in your career. <g>
>
> Your chains wont matter, your charm doesnt work anymore, pixie
> strike doesnt hold monsters well enough, you are like a mosquito
> pricking the enemy with your tiny axe and dirk, and people will
> say "why am I going beserk - what is a burst of strength/speed?"
> Lullaby? Damn, I forgot I even had that... what level was it again?
>
> You will be reduced to nothing but a L32 bard with your manasong =)
>
> Can you play manasong?
> Hey can you twist in manasong during battle?
> Are you playing manasong?
> Don't bother with anything else but manasong.
> Hey, my mind isn't clearing.
>
> Your future gets much better <eg>
>
> Sacastically,
> Harmonic, currently twisting Psalm/Cooling, Berserk, Manasong ;)
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
